name: item_kick
description: A weirdly fragile boot used to kick someone from voice chat that breaks after a single kick.
effect: Kicks a specified user from the voice chat they're in.

name: item_mute
description: An ungodly amount of duct tape you can use to shut someone up for a bit.
effect: Server mutes a specified user for 8 seconds.

name: item_steal
description: An intimidating goose with beady soul-less eyes, a worn-down knife, and an insatiable thirst for violence. Send him out to mug someone.
effect: Steals a random item from a specified user.

name: item_polymorph
description: A giant "Hello My Name Is" nametag with a heaping glob of mousetrap glue on the back.
effect: Changes the nickname of a specified user and enforces it for 10 minutes.

name: item_reflect
effect: Reflects the next item used within 15 seconds on you onto the user instead.

name: item_expose
effect: Shows the latest message deleted/edited by a specified user.

name: item_edwindinner
description: A 4-course meal, 3 hour movie, full season of Breaking Bad, 30 minute nap, 2 hour study session, 4 online quizzes, 100% Hearts of Iron IV achievement run, 10 day wedding, 2 week honeymoon, 1 month vacation, and eventual heat death of the universe all in one easily microwaveable package! Force-feed this to anyone of your choice!
effect: Timeout a specified user for 10 seconds.

name: item_emp
description: Hire 150 tech-savy apes to DDOS the discord servers. They accept payments in edbucks, bananas, Madagascan treasury bonds, and Bored-ape Yacht Club NFTs.
effect: Lowers the bitrate of the voice channel you are in for 20 seconds.
